Hankey. io.Mr. E.W.Malkin,'Q,B.(Circulated for information)..2, -Whitehall Gardens,S.V/.1. *18th February, 1920.Sir,I am directed by Mr. Lloyd George to inform you, forthe information of the Drafting Committee, that at a Meetingof the Supreme Council this afternoon it was decided that -Both the Covonaht of the League of Nationsand the Labour Clauses should be includedin the Treaty of Peace with Turkey.I amSir,Your obedient Servant(Sgd.) M.P.A.HAHKEY.p.W.Malkin Esq., C.B.FOREIGN OFFICE,S.W.I.
